Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
masturbate \masturbate\ v. i. [imp. & p. p. {masturbated}; p. pr. & vb. n. {masturbating}.] To achieve sexual gratification by stimulating one's own sexual organs, without the aid of a partner; -- typically to the point of orgasm. -- {masturbator}, n.
Syn: wank, she-bop, jack off, jerk off, whack off, beat the meat. [WordNet 1.5]

masturbate v 1: stimulate sexually; "The old man wanted to be masturbated by the prostitute" 2: get sexual gratification through self-stimulation [syn: {wank}, {fuck off}, {she-bop}, {jack off}, {jerk off}]
